DOC.brief_summary: To explore whether dietary supplementation version Anatabloc ( R ) exert effect blood level amyloid beta ( AÎ² ) , impact global functional measure Alzheimer 's Disease ( AD ) subject mild moderate AD .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluate Dietary Supplementation With Version Anatabloc ( R ) Subjects With Alzheimer 's Disease
DOC.criteria: At least 65 year old . Have diagnosis probable AD concurrent diagnosis probable AD possible probable vascular dementia . Score 16 MiniMental State Examination ( MMSE ) . Otherwise stable medical history general health . Weigh 45 kg 120 kg inclusive . Have contraindication , allergy , sensitivity study product component . Be currently take follow medication : systemic ( oral injectable ) glucocorticoid ; interferonalpha ; antiCD20 antibody ( e.g. , rituximab ) ; antiCTLA4 antibody ( e.g. , ipilimumab ) . Be current smoker smokeless tobacco user .
